items.content_html: Mega Game Database is a lightweight personal game tracker built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Easily add, edit, search, and sort games across different consoles, prioritize your backlog, track completion, and browse tags. Includes local save support, RAWG API search, neon PS2-style visuals, and mobile responsive design.
items.title: mailburch/MegaGameDB: Mega Game Database is a lightweight personal game tracker built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Easily add, edit, search, and sort games across different consoles, prioritize your backlog, track completion, and browse tags. Includes local save support, RAWG API search, neon PS2-style visuals, and mobile responsive design.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
